Sections.Text: The Tyree Sanitorium closed in 1919, the property seized by the federal government. But no policeman or official ever dared venture into the sealed catacombs beneath the cursed house.
Peter Chelios, noted philanthropist and antiquarian is determine to reclaim the structure and turn it into a museum. But he knows that he has to clear out whatever's in the catacombs first.
The last two teams he sent in didn't come back, but he learned enough from their tragic deaths to discern that the creature down there is severely allergic to light.
Each member of this final team carries Luciferic Beacons, which create pools of magical sunlight. These will weaken the creatures of darkness, making them vulnerable.
If the team can place beacons in five different chambers of the catacombs, they will cleanse the evil and destroy the supernatural darkness.
No doubt the denizens will grow enraged with each new beacon, calling in reinforcements.
And the beacons are fragile, easily destroyed if left unguarded.
Nikola Fury is an action academic, a paranormal investigator who prefers to get up close and personal in the field.
Tracy Latona is a medium with psychic assistance abilities for her friends and silver bullets in her pistol for things that go bump in the night.
